─ About Me ─

Hello, I'm Lionel, a first-year Mathematics and Computer Science student at the University of Toronto. I’m passionate about Software Engineering, Machine Learning, and Full-Stack Development. I’m actively seeking opportunities to apply my skills in real-world projects.

Feel free to contact me below!
